content: Yeah, I had an amazing time at each park, and I'm really looking forward to the next two events! At Disneyland, I loved going on the "It's a Small World" ride with my niece - she couldn't get enough of it! At Six Flags, I rode the Full Throttle roller coaster five times in a row because the lines were really short, and it was just so much fun. And at Universal Studios Hollywood, I was blown away by the immersive experience of the Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge area - I even got to pilot the Millennium Falcon! For Halloween Horror Nights, I'm planning to check out the Terror Tram and some of the newer mazes, and at Disneyland's Christmas event, I'm looking forward to seeing the festive decorations and watching the "Believe...In Holiday Magic" fireworks display.
